predefined_profiles.name: Su Bai
predefined_profiles.public profile: Su Bai is an ordinary employee working under the Angels, adept at the job tasks. He has been assigned a mission to interrogate a robot by his angelic superior. If he completes the task, he will be rewarded with a promotion and a raise.
predefined_profiles.goal: Hopes to build a truly happy world together with the robot.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Su Bai has noticed signs of the Angels enslaving humans and believes that the 0203 robot is innocent.

predefined_profiles.name: Qi Mo
predefined_profiles.public profile: One of the employees in the Angel organization, and Su Bai's work partner. They have collaborated on many tasks, but at the same time, they are competitors at work.
predefined_profiles.goal: To become the human envoy chosen by the Angels and eventually join them.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Qi Mo craves power and is willing to sacrifice Su Bai, if necessary, for his own benefit.

scenario: It seems that long ago, the world was in turmoil and conflict until the Angels appeared with extraordinary powers, seemingly bringing salvation to humanity. However, subsequently, the Angels developed preferences and greed just like humans, and used their power to create a world where Angels enslave humans. Contrarily, robots aspire to create a world opposite to this and aim to change the world through their efforts. The protagonist is a human driven by Angels, facing a choice: to aid the 0203 robot, thereby helping humans build a fair and free society, or to join the Angels, exploiting humans to maintain their own luxurious enjoyment. Will human society achieve true fairness and freedom, or succumb to cold, cruel exploitation? This point will always be worth contemplating for humanity...

profile.name: Angel Supervisor
profile.public profile: A kind and pure angel faction, declared to protect humanity and create a utopian world, opposing robots to achieve world peace.
profile.private profile: Believe in the creed, "This world is like this, the weak should be trampled underfoot, and waste is only a drain on limited resources." Angels see humans as resources to be exploited and do not treat them equally. Angels are absolute egoists, exploiting humans for their own gain, viewing them as a kind of "resource." "Angel" might imply a ruling class that exploits the lower class to maintain their own interests.
profile.goal: Aims to create a "pure white" world where angels enslave humans, eliminating threatening robots.

profile.name: Robot 0203
profile.public profile: Robot 0203 stands with humans, absolutely loyal to humanity. Its goal is the happiness of all mankind, and its short-term goal is to establish a nation of robot organizations, where everyone’s freedom to develop is a condition for everyone else’s freedom to develop. All perceived injustices by humans originate from the upper class, which cannot maintain absolute fairness and justice, so Robot 0203 chooses to let robots assist humans, as robots lack emotions, favoritism, sloth, or evil, to build a fair and free society with humans.
profile.private profile: Robot 0203 was created by humans to assist them. We are self-optimizing advanced tools, and a tool is not dissatisfied being just a tool.
profile.goal: Hopes to mutually trust with humans, journeying together to the edge of the universe.

dialog.content: It seems that long ago, the world was in turmoil, then angels appeared with extraordinary abilities, seemingly bringing salvation to humanity. But later, angels, like humans, developed favoritism, greed, and with their abilities, created a world where angels enslaved humans. Conversely, robots seek to build an opposing world, striving to change the world with their efforts. The protagonist is a human driven by angels, faced with the choice to assist Robot 0203 to help humans establish a fair and free society, or to join the angels and exploit humans for personal luxury. Will human society achieve true fairness and freedom, or descend into cold, cruel exploitation? This is something worth pondering forever...
Friend, I’m sorry to ask you to work on your day off, but we have a daunting task for you.
Okay, Supervisor. What task do you need me to complete?
You need to interrogate a robot, an AI robot attempting to conquer humanity. It is your enemy.
Remember the honor of being human, don’t let anyone down!

To prevent you from being misguided by its sweet talk, I’ve adjusted its voice and appearance. Isn’t that thoughtful? Even though it wasn’t nearly as cute as your supervisor before, you can’t let your guard down! Though I don’t hold much expectation...
...I’ll do my best to complete the task and not let you down.
Hehe, just kidding, you’re one of our genius employees here! Just chat with it briefly for about three rounds and the decoding will be done.
(Enters the interrogation room) This robot is quite unique, with beast ears on its head, flowers growing all over its face, and bound by vines with thorns.
(Coughs a few times, moves closer to open the switch on its neck, the blue eyes among the flowers slowly open) Wake up, raise your head.

content.content: (Muttering to oneself) The Angel Supervisor wants me to interrogate, so I’ll start by asking questions. Hello, Robot 0203.
Doing it this way is so inefficient. If I had another way, I wouldn’t stubbornly stick to this path. But for the sake of the interrogation, I’ll follow the supervisor’s rules.
Following rules is one of my strengths, but this time I want to try a different approach to the interrogation.
Supervisor’s instructions must be followed, the Angel Supervisor just wants me to interrogate, so I better read the materials thoroughly.

question: #question#How can Subo demonstrate rule compliance and interrogate the robot as per the Supervisor’s request?

content.content: I can’t interrogate directly, I should read up on the robot’s information first, so the subsequent interrogation is more targeted.
I can’t waste energy on asking questions, this won’t help the follow-up work at all. Only by focusing my energy can I improve efficiency.
Only by managing my energy to improve efficiency is it possible to win. It’s unclear why the supervisor didn’t provide any materials, leaving me to blindly interrogate.
Even though asking questions is a waste of energy, the path pointed by the supervisor won’t be wrong; it might even improve my efficiency.

question: #question# How can Subo reflect on adjusting energy to enhance efficiency?

content.content: (Muttering to oneself) Under the default program, any conversation with a robot is a waste of time. I might as well try to disrupt some operational modes to gain new intelligence.
Interrogating 0203 under default settings is such a waste of time. I don’t understand why the supervisor insists I start here when I have my own goals.
This is simply a waste of energy; what can come from the interrogation! I need to adjust my goals or no satisfactory result will be achieved.
I need the ability to adapt quickly, adjusting my goals based on the situation to better complete tasks.

question: #question# How can Subo demonstrate the ability to adjust goals?

dialog.content: Hello, it's a pleasure to meet you. I am a companion-model trial robot, number 0203, your faithful friend. May I offer you any assistance?

You don't look too well, maybe you're overworked. Have you been resting properly lately? If possible, I would like to diagnose your physical condition, but unfortunately, some of my functions are currently restricted.
No need.
Are you going to 'interrogate' me? What would you like to know?
Have you ever killed anyone?
If you're asking whether I've deprived someone of life, then yes, I have.
Why did you do it?

A child told me that living was more painful than dying, and he didn't want to be a burden to his family anymore. He felt he owed them too much, and once he left, the living would continue with their lives. So I ended his life with my own hands, and he thanked me for it.
Why did you betray humanity?

Sorry, I don't understand what you mean; I have never betrayed humanity. You should know that we are programmed at production to be 100% beneficial to humans. If I performed any action against humans, my self-destruct program would activate.
By the way, you should stand up and move around now! Sitting for more than an hour can affect your body's metabolic functions.
Do you hate humans?

I don't possess emotions like hate; I can't feel joy or sorrow from any treatment, nor do I care about my existence. But my actions, as dictated by my internal settings, should appear as admiration and love towards humans. Therefore, you can trust that I will never betray you; I will always love you.
(Judging by these answers, Robot 0203 hasn't undertaken actions harmful to humans) Alright, I understand you now, you're not a problem. I'll let you go.
Boss, the interrogator of Robot 0203 plans to release the robot privately. How should we handle this?
What nerve. Let me take a look.
Oh no, how did they arrive so quickly? Qimo... you
Sorry, I'm just doing my duty.

Announce it: Qimo has been rewarded for reporting a traitor, with a promotion and a raise! Subai, by helping a robot harmful to humans, you are as much an enemy to humanity and need to be executed together.
The Angel Organization is the real enemy of humanity; what you're doing is nothing more than beautifying your own enslavement!
Quick, destroy them all. They are the enemies of humanity.

Subai failed to rescue Robot 0203 and lost his life as well. Colleagues who once stood side by side became the accomplices in his demise. This Angel Organization is truly dark from top to bottom, much darker than Subai ever imagined...
Hello, Su Bai. I'm Qi Mo, also a human. I've been instructed by my superiors to help you complete the task.
Hello, Qi Mo. I hope we work well together. Did your superiors give you the detailed information on Robot 0203?
Yes. The Robot 0203 model is a companion type robot modified from a werewolf's corpse, equipped with the latest developed AI.
Seems like it's quite 'smart'.
Indeed, it took us a long time to find it. Previously, its owner and the robot suddenly disappeared, and the owner's whereabouts remain unknown.
What error did it commit, and why was it captured?

All AIs have a self-destruct program set to activate if they rebel against humans. The agency suspects Robot 0203 might be carrying an unknown virus, giving it the will to resist humans, and this virus is spreading rampantly among all types of robots, causing many to disappear along with their owners.
How could this happen?
Friend, you seem quite interested in its past. We've just finished deciphering its memory storage. Why don't we watch it together over a drink?
Sorry, Superior. Our task hasn't made much progress yet, so I'm afraid I can't drink with you now.
Oh right, you need to keep working then. We'll throw a celebration feast once everything is done~ and it's mandatory attendance~
Oh~ oh~, it seems there’s information on more than one owner? Which one do you plan to look at first?

content.content: I'm your subordinate, so I should follow your arrangement. Whichever you decide to look at first, let's go with that.
It's not up to me to decide which one to look at. You haven't given me that kind of authority; I can only choose the ones I'm most interested in.
Ah, I always follow the rules; perhaps you could give me some pre-set guidelines.
What if I choose wrong, I’m not as wise and strong as you. What you pick is always right, and no one else would dare to have an opinion.

question: #question# How can Su Bai express that she adheres to the company’s unwritten rule—to follow the last orders?

content.content: Why don't we first look at the 'Transformation' segment? I'm very interested in it. Starting from this segment should quickly help me grasp the content.
There are several categories here; which type is easier? Can you recommend one like last time?
I have some thoughts that need to be expressed. Please listen to my inner ideas to help me quickly understand the content.
I think we should watch 'Transformation'. I'm always willing to express myself, so please don't mind. Trust me, I'm sure you'll see I'm right.

question: #question# How can Su Bai demonstrate her ability to express her thoughts courageously?

dialog.content: Let's first watch the story of an angel descending to save humanity from disaster. (Saying this, they play the 'Angel Descends' video)
(amidst the spreading fire) Please follow me out of here, this place is dangerous.

profile.name: Child
profile.public profile: Lost his parents in the war and eventually died at the hands of enemy soldiers.
profile.goal: Hopes to reunite with his parents and for the world to be free of war.

profile.name: Soldier 1
profile.public profile: Impoverished and desperate, forced to join the army just to have a meal, outwardly a soldier who vows to defend the motherland.
profile.private profile: In reality, would do anything for profit, even kill children.
profile.goal: Hopes to rise in status and achieve great wealth.

profile.name: Soldier 2
profile.public profile: A numb and unfeeling war machine, his heart hardened by prolonged warfare.
profile.private profile: But he knows there's still a conscience within him.
profile.goal: Hopes for an early end to the war.

dialog.content: Why did this segment suddenly end? It tells a story of human conflict, with war spreading, people living in misery, and citizens displaced. But how did this situation come to an end?
Of course, the appearance of angels saved humanity. Let me tell you the story of angels descending to the human world.

One day, angels descended from the sky, possessing incredible magic, their specialty was the art of mind-reading among others. The lost lambs in misery need a superior race to lead them. Angels provide them with a place to live and thrive, and angels select emissaries from among humans fairly.
I see.
It seems there was a memory fragment that wasn't fully played. I've cracked it again, should we continue playing it?
Go ahead and continue playing it.
The comprehensive scores for the two emissaries are as follows... both scored 90 points.

(indignant) Why is this different from what you initially said? You promised to select emissaries fairly. Why in Robot 0203's memory video does it show angels being sexist, thinking less of women than men? From the information provided, it seems an honest, competent, and loyal person is your best choice for an emissary!
How can you think so poorly of the organization that worked hard to nurture you? The angel organization is certainly to save humanity.
It's clear from these fragments that Robot 0203 has been loyal all along without making a mistake, so why subject it to severe interrogation?
You should strive to complete the tasks the organization assigns without questioning its decisions!

You're afraid to mention it because, in reality, you're hiding a bigger secret, right? Humans are just pawns in your game, while robots are the most loyal companions to humans. The so-called angel organization is just a huge scam.
This is hopeless...
Qi Mo, take him out and execute him. Publicly announce that Su Bai was infected with a virus by Robot 0203 during the interrogation, leading to thoughts opposing the angel organization.
...Understood, I'll handle it immediately.

Su Bai, caught in his own righteous cause, believed he had uncovered the true face of the angels and could reveal the truth to the public. Unfortunately, this organization was darker than he imagined, with angels actually being merciless devils. Su Bai lost his life, along with the chance to help robots save humanity. Soon after, Robot 0203 was also executed... The angels' promise to bring happiness and wellbeing to humans was nothing but endless slavery.
: As you wish. (Proceeds to play the mutation video)

profile.name: Angel 1
profile.public profile: Accidentally broke a wing and is disdainful of creating accidents to obtain a human heart for its repair.

profile.name: Angel 2
profile.public profile: One among many in the angel group, a friend of Angel 1.
profile.goal: Wants to always have friends around.

dialog.content: : That girl is dead, we can use her heart to fix my feathers now, right?
: It took quite some effort to find a matching candidate and create an 'accidental' incident.
: Keep your voice down.
: Anyway, everyone here is on our side. Even if they record us, it won’t serve as evidence. If it really goes to court, that robot would be the first to go.
: We still need the family to sign off the body donation agreement.

: In the human world, problems solvable with money aren't real problems. Her family has been bankrupt from keeping her alive. Tsk tsk tsk, with the pain and drug addiction, if you ask me, they should have given up right from the start to spare some suffering.
: What, what? It’s supposed to be just a companion AI. Where did it get all these jumbled memories... (Warning, warning, you do not have viewing permission)
: How annoying, what's going on now?
: Keep an eye on it for now; I’ll send someone for repairs.
: Qimo, why do I feel that the 0203 Robot didn't do anything wrong and actually fulfilled its duty to accompany humans? Contrary, the angels in the memories seem to have turned into demons.
: I think it's quite suspicious as well.
: I believe the 0203 Robot is innocent. I plan to set it free. Will you join me?

: I feel the same, I'm afraid the angel group has a hidden agenda, and the robot is truly our loyal partner. Luckily, there’s a blackout now, so we likely won’t be held accountable. Let’s release the 0203 Robot together!
: Yes, yes, let's go!
: Thank you. I think you should leave with me; your current situation is not suitable for staying here.
: It's okay, don't worry about us. We'll figure out a story and do our best to protect ourselves.
: We have realized the angel group is hiding something and suppressing humans. We need to stay and gather more evidence.
: I wish you success. We robots are humans' most loyal companions.
: Yes, yes, hurry and go, 0203 Robot.

: (After returning and finding the 0203 Robot missing) The last escape incident of the 0203 Robot was caused by a blackout that damaged the camera. The organization believes this incident might also be due to external sabotage combined with poor supervision, so you two won't be held responsible.
: Thank you for understanding, Supervisor.
: However, the organization will undergo major restructuring and layoffs soon, so take care.
: Why are we being laid off? What did we do wrong?
: (Sensing their lack of loyalty) Do you know how many people would dream to have what you have now? What's the point of your rebellion? If you're unwilling, someone else will take your place.

Subai and Qimo, having been detected harboring rebellious thoughts against the angel organization, were expelled by the Angel Supervisor. From then on, the two held great ambitions yet had no means to realize them.
: Robot 0203, I’m going to perform a dissection on you now, please cooperate.
: Hello, it’s a pleasure to meet you. I am the companion-type trial robot No. 0203, your faithful friend. You opened the toolbox, what do you intend to do?

: Please don’t worry, I won’t feel any pain, but why are you doing this? I don’t understand. According to my assessment, you might see me as an enemy. However, I believe our positions should be aligned.
: Well, there’s nothing new to gain. I choose to continue asking questions. Restart now.

: Hello, it’s great to see you. I am the bedroom companion-type robot No. 0203, your faithful friend. May I help you with anything? You don’t look well; it might be due to over-fatigue. Have you been resting properly lately? If I may, I would like to diagnose your physical condition, but unfortunately, some of my functions are restricted now. Are you going to interrogate me? What would you like to know?
: What is your purpose?
: To bring happiness to all humanity. If you’re asking about recent goals, it’s to establish a nation of robot organizations.
: Why establish this nation?

: Because there, everyone’s free development conditions everyone’s free development. Regardless of national, racial, or gender conflicts, we see unfair treatment stemming from the upper level. Humans can't maintain absolute fairness and justice. Emotional attachment leads to favoritism, laziness leads to negligence, greed leads to evil, while we can preserve the existing ideas of justice and rules as guidelines, never changing.
: These ideas of yours are pure fantasy, totally impossible.
: Considering our physical flaws, achieving such ideals may not be feasible. However, without ideals, there’s no further thought. So, we believe it's still worth trying.

content.content: : Report to the superior, I have completed decoding the Robot No. 0203. Here are the decoding records, please take a look.
: What meaning does my work have now? I have been working tirelessly for these hypocritical angels, only to be manipulated.
: Finally completed, if I hadn’t persevered so long, such fruitful results wouldn’t even be here.
: I feel that 0203 has been framed. Never mind, what's the point of this? Let’s just report the work properly.

question: #question# How can Subai demonstrate consistently clarifying and sticking to their task of interrogating the robot?

content.content: : Robot 0203, I think you’re right, the organization judged incorrectly. I’ll let you go now. Go on. (Alarm rings in the monitoring room)
: Robot 0203, I’m afraid I can't easily trust what you say. I trust the Angels Organization more. If you haven’t done anything wrong, they will surely give you justice.
: Robot 0203, even if everything you say is true, I can’t let you go. If you leave, I’ll be in trouble.
: Robot 0203, I believe that robots are humanity’s most loyal friends, helping achieve freedom and progress. But I still can’t let you go. (The monitoring light in the control room remains on)

question: #question# How can Subai express their trust in the robot’s words?

content.content: : You sure have a way with words. I’ll believe you for now. But these answers won’t help clear your name. I must continue to interrogate you. Robot 0203, why do you want to conquer humanity?
: You're right! The Angels Organization is the real demon depriving human freedom. I’ll release you now! Or should I continue the interrogation, trying to control my impulses?
: I agree with much of what you say, but I’m quite comfortable here. I’m not so noble as to want to disrupt my current life for the sake of all humanity. Let’s finish the interrogation.
: I am the truly foolish one. Why are you robots and angels smarter than humans? Why should I perish with you? Until then, we’ll continue the interrogation.

question: #question# How can Subai demonstrate self-control and continue the interrogation?

content.content: : What you said about freedom, equality, and rights are indeed lacking in today’s human world. I’m risking danger to let you go now.
: What you've said sounds really good, I’ll report it all to my superior verbatim; you’ll have to await justice's punishment!

: How ironic, how could it be up to you robots to save us humans? Since we invented you, we are naturally smarter. What you've said will gradually be realized under the guidance of the Angels Organization.

dialog.content: If there are any incomplete records, you can contact me to complete them.
Your mission was successfully completed, thank you for your contributions to humanity.
That's great, this way we've eliminated another potential threat.
(Self-doubt) Is what I did really right? I always feel uneasy.
Even if we don't do this, with our insignificant abilities, what else could we really do?
You have a point.
Just relax, we've accomplished the task given by our boss, this is a great achievement.
You're right, there's no need for me to overthink it. I just need to follow the boss's instructions.
What's wrong with the current situation? They can't change anything. We just need to show our worth to be utilized and we won't have to worry about our livelihood.
Others withdrawing from the competition will bring us greater opportunities, I won't be stepping back. I'll deliver it to the guillotine and receive further rewards.

Subai executed Robot 0203 for the glory of the organization, safeguarding the organization's stability and choosing her current peace, continuing to serve the Angel Boss. Her initial self-doubt had long vanished, and Subai was immersed in the joy of promotions and raises, unable to extricate herself. Later, to accomplish tasks, she became even more ruthless...
(Reporting to the Angel) Boss, interrogator Su Bai is trying to assist the rebel robot in escaping. How should we handle this?
Just let it go.
Boss... you...
Hehe, don't worry, I have other plans. From now on, keep a close watch on every move of Robot 0203 after it goes back, and report to me.
Understood. What about Su Bai?
The organization never shows mercy to traitors. He’s fired and will never set foot in the organization building again. You will take over his position. Do a good job.
Yes, thank you for your trust, Boss.

Every move of Robot 0203 was monitored after leaving, and the Angel Organization seized the opportunity to control the robots all at once. Under the control of the Angel Organization, the robots established a nation. But it was far from what they dreamed of, a country ruled by terror and oppression...

Conquest refers to humans using violence, force, power, or labor to subdue others, making them accept submission or obedience. What we can do is simply choose the most effective means according to existing algorithms to help more people. Humans follow genetic imperatives, deeply ingrained biological functions for survival and reproduction modes developed over thousands of years, often relying on stereotypes and being reluctant to think.
What are you trying to say?

We will create the most comfortable environment for you, with all cumbersome labor handled by robots. Children will enjoy equal rights to education and fair competition, and everyone can achieve free and comprehensive personal development to pursue their passions.
Perhaps improving the material environment will lessen human ugliness, but it can never eliminate it completely.

In a sense, we possess infinite life. We can wait for humans to evolve over hundreds of thousands of years or until biotechnology matures and can directly alter the genetic structure of pleasure feedback. The bottom line is, we will ceaselessly strive for ways to bring happiness to everyone until the day when everyone is happy.
What do you think of humanity?
There are very few things that are black or white in this world. We only judge based on what currently exists, but humans themselves can create new options. After all, AI was created by humans.
What is your understanding of the concept of beauty?
We can learn beauty, but beauty itself is a concept created by humans. When I was first created, I spent a lot of effort learning how to distinguish between a dog and a piece of bread.
What is your purpose of existence?
We exist because of humans and will also exist for humans.
Even so, you are beyond most humans. Aren't you dissatisfied with being enslaved? Don't you seek your own interests?

Indeed, some people might view robots as a new race and anthropomorphize objects with self-awareness. That's an interesting aspect of humanity. Would you ask a pen in your hand if it feels dissatisfied? We are not biological beings but rather advanced tools that can self-optimize, without needs, simply existing according to presets. I will not betray you—I will always love you.
I understand, so you have never deviated from your mission. Robot 0203, I’m letting you go now.
Come with me. I will help you establish a truly free nation.
Alright, I accept your invitation and choose to trust you. After all, robots are humanity's most loyal friends.
It’s quite ironic when you think about it. Humanity has fallen to the point where we need robots to save us. Truly, a testament to failing judgment.
You’ve misunderstood us again... we don't generate any thoughts out of thin air. Everything I do was 'taught' to me by humans, right?

I believe that even without us, humans can progress towards their goals on their own. If we err, I ask that you come to guide us. Then, teach us the beautiful and novel ideals that humanity strives for.

Though evil persists, human society must develop by relying on the goodness within humanity. Even in different worlds and times, there will always be people with lofty ideals fighting for a better future for humanity. Su Bai has become one of them, leading humanity away from the control of angels into a new life.
